1.title: 1SG Jerry Peters - Auodad
1.plot: Sgt. Jerry Peters is a pathfinder, sniper, and drill sergeant who was ambushed by a RPG attack which nearly took his life. Now he hunts through rugged terrain for free range aoudad in Texas.

2.title: GEN Walt Boomer & SGT Jason Pacheco - Moose
2.plot: Two Marines, Retired General Walt Boomer and Staff Sergeant Jason Pacheco, head to Newfoundland, Canada in search for a monster moose. As they traverse the Canadian wilderness, it will be a rugged test for the General and the scout sniper.

3.title: MOH Recipient SFC Leroy Petry
3.plot: Medal of Honor recipient, MSG Leroy Petry searches for a nice whitetail buck in Del Rio, Texas. Join us as we look back on the heroic actions of past Medal of Honor recipients - the highest honor for our military personnel.

4.title: Best of Grateful Nation Season 10
4.plot: We look back at the brave American heroes who were honored in the 2018 season of Grateful Nation.

5.title: SSG Doug Wenzel & SGM Shane Briel
5.plot: Two battle-tested warriors are tested physically and mentally, as they search for the mule deer of their dreams, at the Field of Dreams in Montana.

6.title: CPL Nick Clark
6.plot: Retired CPL. Nick Clark is introduced to pheasant hunting at the Thunderstik Lodge in South Dakota. With fellow veterans, including former Blue Angels pilot, Jim Maslowski, and great hospitality, Nick Clark will remember this experience forever.

7.title: SGT Omar Hernandez
7.plot: Sergeant Omar Hernandez served three tours in Iraq before suffering debilitating injuries while saving the lives of two Iraqi police caught in the crossfire. He has courageously overcome his injuries to stalk the terrain of Arizona for the elusive Coues deer.

8.title: CPT Shell, CPL Crabbe, SGT Rypstra & SGT Goessens
8.plot: A look back at the greatest stories over 10 seasons of Grateful Nation.

9.title: SGM Mark Baylis
9.plot: SGM Mark Baylis is a decorated soldier, serving in three units in the Army, and he's out in the heart of Michigan to find a beautiful, mature whitetail. With two other veterans by his side, he has the hunt of a lifetime at the Sanctuary Ranch.

10.title: Challenges Met & Overcome
10.plot: In this special episode, Tim looks back at some of the most inspirational heroes that we've hunted with.

1.title: Sgt Kody Wilson - Wyoming Mule Deer
1.plot: Sgt. Ret. Kody Wilson and host, Tim Abell Head to Greybull, Wyoming to participate in a special veterans hunt hosted by the entire town.

2.title: Sgt Robert Leonard - Wyoming Mule Deer
2.plot: Host Tim Abell and Sgt. Robert Leonard are in Greybull, Wyoming after a big mule deer thanks to the continuing generosity of the entire town and Banded Brigade Outdoors.

3.title: Sgt Ben Hockett - Michigan Whitetail
3.plot: This week, Tim is off to Michigan's famed Sanctuary Ranch with Sgt. Ben Hockett, where they were kind enough to donate one of their monster deer for this war hero to hunt.

4.title: Kenny Rypstra - Colorado Elk
4.plot: After 8 seasons of Grateful Nation, a theme is emerging. Paying it forward. This year, GN alum, Troy Givens, was able to track down and surprise the medic who saved his life with a dream elk hunt.

5.title: Cpl Denny Salisbury - Texas Red Sheep
5.plot: Cpl. Denny Salisbury is down in Texas at Double Diamond Outfitters after red sheep and whitetails.

6.title: Sgt Wesley Spaid - Texas Whitetail
6.plot: T9E ranch in Pearsall, Texas is the host of this week's hunt and Sgt. Wesley Spaid is after a "management" buck by their standards, but a world class trophy anywhere else!

7.title: Spc Jonathan Belli - Texas Whitetail
7.plot: Specialist Jonathan Belli and the GN crew are down at the Double T ranch in Texas in pursuit of whitetail.

8.title: Sgt Matt Berth - Nebraska Turkey
8.plot: A show close to home this week as Grateful Nation producer, Matt Guth, reconnects with a wounded veteran from his home town, Matt Berth, and takes him on his first ever turkey hunt.

1.title: SGT Joshua Goessens & SSG Terry Knight - Bison
1.plot: Two American soldiers coping with ALS - Lou Gehrig's Disease - hunt Bison in the central California countryside. For these two brave veterans, enjoying their days in the field is the real trophy.

2.title: Sgt. Dylan Porter and Sgt. Kelly Nieskens - Elk
2.plot: Five wounded veterans from Montana convene for healing, camaraderie, and an unforgettable elk hunt. Two hunters get behind the trigger looking for a trophy bull.

6.title: CWO2 Dan Carlton - New Mexico Elk
6.plot: Chief Warrant Officer Dan Carlton heads to the land of the giants to hunt bull elk with RedRock Outfitters. As a special bonus, his son Daniel has a cow tag and looks to add meat to the veteran's freezer.

9.title: Best of Grateful Nation
9.plot: Elk, whitetail, and bison are on the agenda in this look back at the best hunts from this season of Grateful Nation.

imdb.plot outline: Grateful Nation is a unique and compelling outdoor adventure series that goes behind the scenes and into the hunting fields with American disabled veterans. This original unscripted program takes viewers inside the minds of wounded combat veterans and returns them to their traditional American hunting heritage. The majority of narrative for each episode comes from the organic conversation between the featured Vet and host in the context of the hunt. Hosted by former Army Airborne Ranger Tim Abell, this series will keep you captivated by the brave soldiers and the stories they will hold with themselves for a lifetime.
imdb.title: Grateful Nation
plot: _Grateful Nation_ (qv) is a unique and compelling outdoor adventure series that goes behind the scenes and into the hunting fields with American disabled veterans. This original unscripted program takes viewers inside the minds of wounded combat veterans and returns them to their traditional American hunting heritage. The majority of narrative for each episode comes from the organic conversation between the featured Vet and host in the context of the hunt. Hosted by former Army Airborne Ranger Tim Abell, this series will keep you captivated by the brave soldiers and the stories they will hold with themselves for a lifetime.::Chris Dorsey
